name: Delay N Defuse
description:
Heads up! We need your help to take care of these bombs!

In Delay N Defuse, you are tasked with keeping bombs alive until you can safely reach the defusal station. In this simple puzzle game, you'll try to reach the defusal station within a certain number of moves. Use charging hubs to your advantage, otherwise you won't be able to make it!

Entry for the Ludum Dare 46 Jam

Disclaimer: I'm very new to this, so I'm not sure if there's other stuff I should be doing here? Hopefully you enjoy the game!
